verses.name: Jeremiah 23:18
verses.text: For who hath stood in the counsel of the Lord, and hath perceived and heard his word? who hath marked his word, and heard it?

verses.name: Jeremiah 23:19
verses.text: Behold, a whirlwind of the Lord is gone forth in fury, even a grievous whirlwind: it shall fall grievously upon the head of the wicked.

verses.name: Jeremiah 23:20
verses.text: The anger of the Lord shall not return, until he have executed, and till he have performed the thoughts of his heart: in the latter days ye shall consider it perfectly.

verses.name: Jeremiah 23:21
verses.text: I have not sent these prophets, yet they ran: I have not spoken to them, yet they prophesied.
